results.name: In The Blue Hour of Twilight

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04+ or SteamOS
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: The game regularly saves your data to the Steam Cloud. So an internet connection is highly recommended!
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
